name: Jstacoder.github.io
body:
### Welcome to My World
Come along with me to learn about python, and maybe have some fun along the way, or not. Its kind of up to you.

```python
>>> from os import path
>>> print os.path.realpath(os.path.curdir)
>>> print 'Python examples'
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, your confused.
>> left over from the original template

### Flask
I work as a web developer and as such i spend a lot of time learning about web frameworks. I have used them all, and i must say none can compare to Flask. I will get into it more in the future, but Flask is a great web framework

### Magento
Now im not really a fan of PHP or PHP frameworks, but as this is my job, being a fan dosent always deiced if i work with it or not. Sometimes that is somthing i _have_ to do, and in the case of Magento that is for sure. 
but i have managed to gain a bit of experience with it that id like to share here.

### SugarCrm
Same idea as Magento, not a fan, but use it alot. 

[My blog](kyle-vm.level2designs.com)
